content.detailedDescription:
Driving home around 9:30, i thought i saw 2 helicopters coming down the coastline.  but as they got closer i saw round bright orange objects with colored lights.  they were drifting down the coastline, then stopped and stood still.  i pulled off the freeway to get a better look.  by the time i found a place to pull over, and when i got out of the car, only one object was left.  then, it slowly evaporated.  a minute later, the 2nd object rose up from the horizon and just stood still.  then it also slowly just evaporated.  (they could have just gone quickly up into space, but it looked like they just evaporated into nothingness).  i have told my wife and a couple other people who would not think i was crazy.

my feelings:  i knew these objects were not helicopters, and that they were unidentified flying objects.

i would like to see such things again.  i keep looking out over the channel all the time now when i drive home from work.

questions i have:  are they military?  was this a weather phenomenon?  why would aliens want to send these objects down here (to monitor vandenburg afb or pt. magu naval air station)?  are they spiritual beings?  questions can never be answered i guess...

thank you,

[witness name removed-cms/dr]
educator
content.summary: Saw 2 bright orange round objects with different colored lignts off the coast of carpinteria.

content.detailedDescription: My partner and i were driving west on lomas blvd. on tuesday evening, march 2nd at a few minutes after 6:00pm. the sun was setting and the sky was bright in front of us with some long, thin horizontal clouds that were dark on the horizon. we saw some lights, for lack of something better to call them. highest in the horizon were two bright streaks of light that were moving downward at an angle slowly. if they had been all we saw i would have thought they were meteors or jets, but they seemed strange in combination with the rest of the lights. below them was a spear tip shaped streak of light (as if a spear tip were lying on its side) which seemed to be stationary. below the spear tip and continuing down to the bottom of the horizon, were three more bright lights. they also appeared to be stationary. as we drove down lomas we noticed a light descend from the spear tip. it was as if the spear tip separated into two parts, yet retained its shape while the descending light moved down and away from the tip. we were theorizing about what all the lights might be as we drove and could come up with plausible theories until the tip divided. we didn't have a name or a theory for that. we kept asking eachother, "what is that?" and saying, "that's definitely not normal." the light descended for a couple of minutes and disappeared. then the same thing happened again: the spear tip seemed to separate, yet stay in tact, and a light descended down and away from it. we pulled off the road near university blvd. and watched until the sun set. this was about 20 minutes in all. as the sun set the streaks and lights faded and disappeared. it was difficult to decide whether they had been lit by the setting sun or were making some light of their own, or both. we weren't frightened - just couldn't make sense of it. some parts seemed natural and explainable, but the dividing spear point, well - we couldn't make sense of that and wonder if anyone else saw it or has an explanation.
content.summary: Lights  and streaks in the western sky that i couldn't identify

content.detailedDescription: I and 2 of my friends were driving south east of columbia city, in. our home town at around 8-9 pm , we were on raber rd.. we were seniors at the local high school just out for a fun ride. when on our left, over a group of trees we suddenly noticed a bright light that was right on top of the tree level, very unusual. we instantly stop the car in the middle of the road and we all piled out. we stood in the middle of the country road as the diamond shaped craft slowly moved toward us at a height of not more than 200' in the air. it slid off the top of the trees moving at some where between 10 and 20 mph unbelievable. it made an unusual sound sort of a hum, not one i had ever heard from a plane. we stood there looking up saying to each other "what the hell is that". i'am glad you have a diamond shape listed. because this craft was diamond shaped flying point first with colored lights blinking at all four tips of its shape. it was dark on the bottom and i could not make anything out, but the craft had a bright light on top. and we could only see the glow of the light. the craft past over us giving no indication that it saw us or cared. the car was stopped and running with its lights on. the craft continued to fly in a straight line over a pasture on the other side of raber road. it traveled for another maybe 1/8 of a mile in a straight line. then it took off at 45 degree angle and vanished from view in less than 2 seconds. we were left dumbfounded standing in the middle of the road. one of the most amazing things about this event is that my friends and i never spoken of this event to each other even to this today. and i never told my family or friends the first time i told anyone of this sighting was my wife a few years later.
content.summary: A diamond shaped ufo past over us a 200 feet , moving at 10-20 mph, it disappeared in less than 2 seconds, this event lasted less than 1 min.

content.detailedDescription: Bright flare like object traveling east to west in vicinity of rte 108/rte 33 in stratham nh. low in sky (maybe 1000 ft) witnessed over a distance of maybe 2 miles before object appeared to burn-out. we were traveling at aprox 50 mph, object estimated at aprox 100 mph+. i've never seen a green flare that could travel such a distance, but that is what it looked like.
content.summary: Bright shooting green light low in sky

content.detailedDescription: At aprox. 10:30 pm i was on a nightly hike i do in harrimen state park on the boarder on nj and ny. i was about 4.6 miles into the trail and i saw what i thought was ground light over the next summit on the trail. it looked exactly like hid lights from a new car but i'm 4.6 miles away from any road. i had just called my wife and she sent me a text so i had my iphone out while i was walking. i took the phone out and i tired the hi res camera on and started to take video. as i came over the top of the hill i saw a very bright disk. as i saw it i yelled out loud, the disk took of instantly from the ground with no noise more  rapid then anything i have ever seen. it was the size of a black hawk helicopter and as it pushed off the ground it displaced all of the air in the area making a soft wind much less then a chopper. it was insane and i have never been on a site about ufos before and never have really thought about them but this was 100% the real thing. the most insane part is when i went to the spot about 35 yards away from me where it was it was hovering over what i thought was an abandoned mine shaft. you can't even see the bottom of this shaft and it's on old government land. i have absolutely perfect video and sound of this. what do i do. is the government going to come after me for sending it to you. i need you to see this so you can tell me what the he'll i should do. call me asap. *(wit's phone number deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Hovering over mine shaft all caught on my i phone from 35 yards away

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i was driving down hardy road when i glanced up and seen 3 red lights that was too close to eachother to be 3 planes with the red indicator lights. im a recreational pilot myself and would know if that was the indicator lights people talk about. this was a ufo not a doubt in my mind. my wife and i have took pictures of the event on our cell phones and got really good pictures of it. as soon as i got my recorder out it blasted off way to quick to be a normal plane even a fighter jet. this was an amazing site. it didnt even leave a flare when it took off. this was great to see. im glad i got to witness the event.
content.summary: 3 red lights that looked like triangle hovering then shot off very quick
Green object, blinding light,passed overhead, nosedived into woods.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my porch having a smoke just shortly after i got up and happened to be looking in the se direction from my chair on my veranda.  over the blue mountains (mountains themselves obstructed by neighboring houses (i live i a mobile home park), i seen the object flying horizontal to the ground from my right to left at about 20 degrees up.  at first i thought it might have been a white bird (such as a seagull) but when it moved into the clouds (from the clouds, i realizing afterwards), i knew that birds do not fly that high.  it was about the size of a grain of white rice held at arms distance.  i was certain that is was not an airplane, balloon, bird, etc.  it did not make any sound.

i documented (to myself) ���activity��� in the same region of the sky before on  1-22-11 but is was more like a stationary ���tear drop��� that suddenly appeared and vanished as quickly (about 8-seconds visible) but, perhaps, i should file that as a separate report.  i believe that ���something��� is ���going on��� in that particular area of the sky.

this is my second ufo sighting (the other being the 1-22-11 sighting) and the first time i have reported such a sighting to any organization.
content.summary: White (maybe silver reflecting) ufo flying between and through clouds

content.detailedDescription:
Had heard of unexplained lights near murrysville pa so i decided to drive to the us. 
the first set of lights appeared like a low flying plane with 3 orange/yellow lights and one blinking light. it came from the right hand side (north) and flew towards the left (south bound). the lights changed in their configuration and after approxiamately 8 seconds it disappeared completely.
the second light was brighter and was in a wooded area near a place called duff park, off hwy 22.
after sevral minutes it diappeared, there were no houses near by.
both lights were seen with 10x50 binoculars.
content.summary: Disappearing low flying lights

content.detailedDescription: My parents and i were visiting friends who lived up the street from us in wewoka, oklahoma. the adults were setting on the front pourch talking and their daughter and i was setting on the steps of their sidewalk talking. it was a clear night and a bright moon was shining. at some point i looked up and told her to look at that star moving towards the moon. it was moving from right to left. the whole experience took about five minutes. when it was over, we went and told our parents. they brushed it off and told us to go play. this was in 1954. three years before sputnik. after watching that satalight and several more of ours, it reminded me what i had seen three years before. they looked the same to me. i have told members of my family this story several times over the years.
content.summary: Saw a slow moving star go behind the moon and not come out the other side.

content.detailedDescription: The ufo was a delta shape with what could best be explained by the old v-8 emblems on classic cars, the forward section was a v shape with a neon blue light outlining it and inside the v section was a circular shape with a castleated design in the interior portion of it with a smaller circle inside this part, this was also lit up blue like the rest of the craft. the whole experience was totally silent. i didnt feel any effects from it except that it scared the living hell out of me.
content.summary: Was lying in the back yard at my uncles house with cousins when delta shaped object just lit up above us and flew silently for approximately 2 miles or so then all of a sudden just went out like a light when the switch is turned off.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to glencoe from chaska with my mom and i looked out my window to the sw and saw one bright light being followed by 4 other lights flying in a strange formation. i've seen many aircraft in my life and seen many flying formations but this was most unusual they were flying close to each other and around and away, i lost sight of the objects as they flew ne
content.summary: 5 bright lights

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out in my mom's yard, pregnant at the time, while she was having some friends over the weekend after the 4th of july and i looked to the east to see a bright green ball, which i thought was only a firework, but it stayed hovering in the air for approximately a minute. then when it started going down (and it went shooting down toward the groung) it turned from green to red and went down to the east, which would be the minnesota side, since grafton nd  is pretty close to minn. that monday after the sighting that i had my boyfriend had heard something on the radio of something that went down on the minn. side and after that i tried looking up to see if anyone else had heard or seen anything and there was nothing spoke of it again. i really want to know if what i saw was real or what because i know what i saw i just want to know if you guys have been told about it or have heard anything else on this?
content.summary: It was a bright green ball, that before it streaked across the sky heading to the east and went down it was red.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home from work and headed down pearch orchard rd at lumpkin rd i noticed two bright yellow lights over the cvs on peach orchard and lumpikn rd.  the lights were there breifly and then slowly faded out.  i watched and the lights did not reappear at that location.  less than 30 seconds later, i saw 5-6 bright yellow lights from my location on peach orchard rd.  this time i was a little further down around the area of the wells fargo bank.  i looked down by the overpass of 520 and there were 5-6 bright yellow lights that came on (not in unison) and disappeared again. i watched again and the lights did not reappear.  i turned right at peach orchard rd and windsor spring rd and as i was going down past the the automatic carwash i noticed another bright light right over the trees to my left hand side that appeared and disappeared.  when i got home i informed my husband about what i had seen and we went out on the deck to watch the skies.  we did not see anything else that nights.
content.summary: Blinking yellow lights that disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
On the date listed i was taking out trash and looked upward and notice two very very bright lights in the sky coming from the southwest. as the objects approached they went in different directions.One went to teh north west and teh other went northeast right over me both were no more than  1/3 mile from me .They moved very fast and made no sound what so ever.This is not the first time i have noticed things in the sky.
 on july 4 2010.Wile outside around 7-8 pm i noticed a triangle shape object about the trees with blue lights around it. it aslo made no sound.
one minute it was ther and the next it was gone.
 i don't have a clue what these lights was.,but the thing i do know is the object from both sighting made no sound and was very fast.
content.summary: Two bright light in sky no sound

content.detailedDescription: Observed the light at described time the light was in the north eastern sky over achmen holler .When i saw it i thought it was another c 130 but this was differant it would go down to the ridge line where i could no longer see it under the ridge line and come back up .Finaly when it got close enough to where it was on the other side of the ridge line  it had a light that would come out of it at 3;00 and 7:00 and go back into it and sometime both at the same time? me and my brother watched it fore about 4 min before it slowly dimmed its light and speed off to the south at greater speeds that i have whiteness by any aircraft !This is my first sighting of this kind that i cant figure out on my own .
content.summary: Orange light sometimes red

content.detailedDescription:
On the above time and date was working security at a gated community and was parked in front of the clubhouse. i observed a light floating near to the ground. i exited the security vehicle and walked over to the light and stood about three feet from it. 

the light was the shape and size of a hockey puck and it had the appearance of a fluorescent light bulb in color. it was lightly raining and the object appeared to be hovering erratically over the wet grass and i would estimate it to be about two inches off the ground.

my first impression was that it was smelling the wet grass. i was tempted to reach down and pick it up but did not as i could not understand why it was floating above the ground. i looked up in the sky to see if there was something controlling it but it was overcast and raining and did not observe anything in the sky.

after watching it for a couple of minutes it slowly drifted across the paved entrance road and went down a dead-end alley next to the clubhouse. when it went down the alley it turned on the motion detector lights on the clubhouse.

i did not follow it into the alley because at this time i was a little concerned about my safety as i could not understand how such a small thing could activate the lights. i checked the area about one hour later and everything was normal and secure.

i am reporting this now as i started thinking about this event after watching a tv show about ufos.
content.summary: Sighted small ufo at close distance

content.detailedDescription: It all happened when we were arriving home around 9.30pm and my youngest son, manuel was crying.  so his daddy, nolan diverted his attention to colourful lights in the sky, asking him to look at the aeroplane.  when he stared longer he said it the lights do not look like aeroplane.  as we watched, the object has flickering lights with blue, green, white, red and the object was seen hovering.  at first we thought that it was a helicopter.  then we took out our binoculars and digital camera.  viewing with the binoculars, the lights were colourful, blue, red, green and white and the object was hovering.  nolan says it changes shape when he viewed through the binoculars. then i took a few pictures with my digital camera. as i did  not have my tripod and it was dark and my zoom lens was only 80-200mm, the image was not sharp.  i wanted to take some video shots but was not in time as the object started to drift further and suddenly it disappeared.  the incident of the object hovering with fantastic colourful lights happened for around 20 mins.
content.summary: Hovering with colourful lights

content.detailedDescription: I was walkin my dog in my yard on that afternoon at around 2 pm when i noticed a bright wing shaped object that looked to be about 30 to 35 thousand feet up exacuting very tight banked turns as i watched it closley because iv never seen anything but a bird do such tight turns and thought it strange because it was either reflicting the sunlight or glowing, i watched for 4or so minutes untill it headed off in a north to north west heading and dissapeard almost imedeatly .
content.summary: I watched the glowing wing shaped object doing very tight 360 degree turns for several minutes untill it proceeded off in a north westerley stright path and dissapeared shortley there after

content.detailedDescription: I was a passenger in our car as my husband drove down highway 80 a few minutes east of the highway 65 exit near roseville. the object was directly over the highway approximately at least one hundred feet, but this is difficult to estimate.  it was noticeable because it was relatively low (relative to what one would expect from an aircraft), hovering centered over the highway not to the side where a lightpost would be, relatively small(compared to aircraft), spherical, and glowing with a deep golden radiating light. for a second i thought it could be a helicopter, but it was too stationary, with no flashing lights, of an unusual golden color radiating from all sides, and probably too small to be a helicopter. the object moved only slightly if at all hovering directly over the highway as our vehicle approached.  i noticed it ahead and strained to watch it from the front windshield and then as we passed it, i watched it out of the back window. i told my husband that the object qualifies as an object that i cannot identify  and that he should turn around and pull over along the road so we could study it more closely. as he did not see the object, and did not see an exit nearby or a suitable place to pull over we kept on going. i felt that this was a mistake and that we should have turned around to go back. i felt that the object was extremely unusual and had a somewhat supernatural appearance.
content.summary: Golden orb sphere hovering over highway 80

content.detailedDescription: Myself and a few friends (5 or 6 of us total) were swimming in the pool in my backyard at approximately 10:30 pm eastern standard time. this occurrence took place on a hot summer night in a suburban area outside of cincinnati, oh. there was very little cloud coverage (some bright stars were visible however the proximity of my house to downtown cincinnati usually limits star visibility on an average night), no precipitation was present. we were relaxing in the pool when a friend noticed some odd lights behind some tree cover. eventually over the tree line came a brilliantly lit craft. right away we all asked each other very seriously "what the hell is that thing!?" i immediately recognized this craft as something extra-terrestrial because of the way that it looked like nothing i had ever seen before. it was moving at approximately 10-20 miles per hour. judging by the height of the trees and the distance from the craft to the wooded canopy it was approximately 50 yards off the ground. it was a dark grey pewter color. it was metallic looking. i could not make out too many details about the construction of the craft, however i didn't notice any bolts, rivets, etc.. it was disc shaped, with green, purple, and white lights illuminating the bottom. it passed almost directly above us so our view was mostly of the bottom of the craft, however, when we first noticed it come from over the trees we responded by getting out of the pool to try and get a better vantage point. i was able to see a small part of the side of the craft. it was not completely disc shaped in the way that the stereotypical ufo looks like. it was a rounded, symmetrical hexagonal shape. it appeared to have a cockpit or dome type structure on top but that was unclear. the lights were fairly bright and i could make out the placement of them on the vehicle. there appeared to be one white light paired with one green or purple light on each corner of the hexagon shape. this craft was completely silent as it passed overhead. had this been a man made aircraft at the proximity it was to us there is no way we wouldn't have heard it. also, i have ruled out that it was a man made aircraft because there was no faa required navigation lights present. it was moving much to slow to be an airplane, and no visible sign of a propulsion system (such as helicopter blades, propellers, etc.) were seen. the lights did sort of shutter or gain and lose luminosity however they did not blink. there was never a time when the lights were completely not visible. the movement of the craft itself was very smooth. it never stopped to hover, just kept moving at a steady speed. after about 30-45 seconds from first sight the craft had left our range of visibility going behind another wooded area. unfortunately there was not a camera nearby nor time to go inside to get one to document the sighting. i recently gained interest in the subject of ufo research and decided to contact all the people that witnessed this event with me over ten years ago. in doing so i have confirmed that all of them remember the sighting very clearly and recall it very similarly as myself.
content.summary: Disc shaped, silent, slow moving, colored lights.

content.detailedDescription: i was taking the garbage out and looked sout toward orion and noticed a slow moving shape passing through orion as i got my night vision i could see the outline of the object moving slowly from east to west. i could see the round lights along the bottom of the object in a delta/triangular lay-out 3 on on side 1 on front. i watched as it moved toward the santa monica - lax area and los it in the glare of the city lights. it was a approx. 15,000 feet . i am accustom to seeing air traffic as it comes in from the pacific west and turns over the city to approach lax landing. radar should have picked it up as it is a very monitored air space on friday nights. it made no noise what so ever that i could hear. it has left me stunned and little shaken. it was definitely not a conventional craft.
content.summary: Triangle shape with 7 round lights along the perimiter

content.detailedDescription: My little brother and grandmother were looking at christmas lights and saw a ufo. the claimed that it would demateralize and remateralize in random intervals. white in color. slow. it followed them!
content.summary: De and remateralize.

content.detailedDescription: I was working on my firends car as i em a mechanic by trade when.I look at the south.South east sky when i noticed a light orb move across the sky was not a plane becuse it had no navigation lights flowed it with my eyes also my friend was with me at the time of the event as it moved across the sky it got bright red and then white then dimed a little the whent out completly and no it was not a meteor or any space junk re-entering our atmosphere nor a low altitude satellite fly by....So thats my story
content.summary: A glowing red/white colored orb

content.detailedDescription:
I went to bed that night as usual. i felt fine and had not been recently ill. i woke up at approx. 2:15am because i felt myself starting to throw up, which has never happened to me even when i have been sick.  immediately the thought came into my head that i woke up too soon. i don't even know why i would think that.   i sat on the side of my bed confused as to why this had happened. my husband did not wake up.  i got out of bed, went into the living room and turned on the tv. still confused.  by about 2:30 i went out into the front yard to have a cigarette. i sat down in a chair and looked around the yard and neighborhood as usual  and noticed it was much quieter than usual. i live close to hwy 99 and there is usually traffic noise buy not this night. i looked up into the western  sky across the street and noticed a bright yellow light moving east very very  fast. then i realized there was no noise from this light that seemed to be at the altitude a local plane would be flying at and i should  hear something.  when i wondered to myself what is that the light slowed down very very slow, so slow that i wondered if it is a plane is it going to crash. once i noticed the light i never took my eyes off of it.  it went from moving very fast to moving what seemed to me to be way  too slow like it noticed me watching it. the the thought popped into my head does it see me watching it?  it made a horseshoe turn to go back west, it got a little brighter then disappeared. by this time i am standing in the middle of my front yard with my mouth open in disbelief as to what i saw and wondering where it went. there was no light or sound from the object, it was just gone. i was left screaming in my head to myself what was that? what the hell was that?  after a few minuted i went back inside and sat confused and bewildered as to what had happened.  at about 4am i went back to bed still confused but i went back to sleep.  i woke at about 6am when my husband got up for work.  i told him what i saw and he couldn't explain what he didn't see. at about 6:15am i went back out front and sat in the same chair and had another cigarette.  i then noticed a local flying plane in the sky. this i know was a plane. i could hear it, see it's lights and the numbers on the side of the plane. even the color of the plane. it was flying north. out of the corner of my eye i noticed a silvery white light going south.  just a ball of light, no sound, not identifying marks like the plane i was seeing. the light was slightly higher than the plane and when the two were about to pass each other the silvery white light got a little brighter and disappeared. just like the yellow light from earlier.  i thought the plane must have seen what i saw. i couldn't believe it. twice in the same morning? what just happened? what did i see? i can't explain it.  all i do know is that whatever i saw both of those times that morning did not act like anything i would expect to see in the sky.  planes don't just disappear and they all make noise. i think of myself as an intelligent logical reasonable  person and so does everyone else  i know,  and everyone i have told this to believes i saw something but nobody can give me an explanation.  after this strange sighting i started thinking back and realized i have seen a few  other  unexplainable lights in the sky over the past several years always in the early morning hours. there is more to my story of unexplainable things happening to me. like waking up with a welt on my stomach twice. i tried to explain it away but couldn't. like my son waking with strange dots on his back like he was kicked by a golf shoe but with the marks closer together than a golf shoe would have. my husband being told by a dr. that he has no appendix but has never had it removed.  i'm not saying we have been abducted but these are unexplainable things to us.  if someone can give us a reasonable explanation we welcome it.      
thank you
content.summary: Bright light in sky that went from very fast to very very slow, it turned got brighter and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My sister and i invited some friends over to our house. shortly after people arrived i went out our back door alone. i lit a cigarette while walking out the door into the back yard. 

you're going to hate that i had recently broken my phone and sent it off for repair. 

as i lift my head up the first thing that strikes me is odd bright lights in my left peripheral vision. i glance to my left, over the neighbors wooden fence and there in the sky are two perfectly still large ovals on the horizon behind a row of distant trees, but still clearly visible. i would estimate the distance to be between 1 and 2 miles and the elevation to be about 60-70 feet high (near tops of pine trees).

the ovals were fat and elongated horizontally and glowing a bright pale yellow. i could not decern any features of the ovals aside from light. the lights were much larger and much brighter than a street light which i conveniently had for comparison alongside them. 

the ovals would be about the size of a quarter if i held my arm at length.

i stared in awe for a few seconds, blinking, wondering if they were a reflection of some kind on my glasses, because they were spaced similarly to a pair of giant eyes. so, i began to walk further into my yard to view these lights from a better perspective. 

the ovals hovered perfectly sill in the sky. not any indication of movement in any direction. i took maybe 10 paces and turned to face the lights directly, ever curious as to what i was witnessing.

they vanished instantaneously without movement after a little over a minute.

i told my friends what i had just seen, but had no real explanation.

i have never seen anything like it in the sky.

any ideas? please contact me.
content.summary: Two brilliant, perfectly still, oval lights stare me down then vanish

content.detailedDescription:
(please excuse my lack of capial letters and proper punctuation)
my name is *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) i am 41 and grew up in auburn washington. i moved to the island of kaua'i in 1992 where i resided most of the last 18 years.  i actually have had 3 other unexplainable observations in my lifetime, one other at this location, but i am detailing this particular one which i feel is most significant. i remember the date because school had just gotten back into session and it was a monday, which is my ideal time to head to the westside and seek out some surf and solitude at my very favorite place in the world, a remote, secluded beach area known by surfers as queens pond. its about a mile or so from polihale state park and it borders the navy base which is called pmrf, pacific missile range facility which is one of the most top-secret and secure areas in the world. its public knowledge that the star wars defense system was created and kept here on the base and in the mountains directly behind. its rumored that an underground nuclear sub base is also housed here. 
anyhow, i headed out alone from kapaa, about an hour drive from the east side where i lived. i arrived just after sunset and pulled down the beach in my 4wheel drive to my usual spot. and set up camp. i am not a heavy drinker or drug user but i was sipping on a 22oz micro beer, and was no where near intoxicated. i was strumming on my guitar and was taking full advantage of my solitude, there was not a soul in sight. so i was playing my accoustic guitar really loud, cause normaly i don't want to bother my wife and kids and neighbors. i was really getting into the music and it sounded great. the ocean was flat and there never is any maritime activity out there at night. i had been playing for a couple hours or so and all of a sudden i looked up and noticed two lights close to shore, maybe a couple hundred yards. they were flashing and seemed to be too far apart to be the same vessel. i couldn't see the vessels just the lights and i was surprised they seemed to just have sort of appeared. i was facing the ocean and thought i would have noticed them coming up the coast line or something. i also assumed that it was a boat and also assumed it may be related to the navy base. it remained stationary and kept flashing for maybe 15 or 20 minutes then the 2 lights started to cruise out to sea, toward the west. they moved together and i didn't take my eyes off of them as i continued to play guitar. they moved out to sea for a couple minutes, at a normal boat speed, then all of a sudden stopped. they began quivering and vibrating and the lights stayed on, they weren't flashing and they became extemely bright and intense, then in a flash they shot out to the horizon , a very far distance, in a blink of an eye. speeds not obtainable by anything i've ever seen. and i could see the 2 lights all the way out on the horizon and they were flashing again. my jaw dropped as well as my guitar and i yelled "whoa!!" "what was that?" i didn't pick my guitar back up and had my full attention on these flashing lights out in the distance. after what i would guess to be about a half hour or so the lights started to go up into the air, i would estimate a couple hundred feet or so then back down what appeared to be under water, then back up into the air.  this went on maybe 5 minutes or so then they sat back onto the surface, flashing and began to track north. this is just north of the islands of ni'ihau and lehua. and west of makaha ridge on the island of kaua'i. after a couple minutes they again stopped, started to quiver and vibrate then shot off to the north west at light speed and stopped where i just just barely see them on the distant horizon. it was a clear night. at this time at the border of pmrf to my left, an mp positioned himself on the dune and put on his emergency light. (like a cop or ambulance light) and i watchted the 2 flashing lights for maybe a half hour to an hour, then the lights just went out. the mp turned his emergency light off as well. i kept my eye on the ocean towards the northwest and pondered what i had seen. it remained dark and i got bored and strated playing my guitar again. keeping an eye on things. after about an hour (i'm guessing on time, details of what i'm seeing are exact) the area where i last saw the 2 lights, to the north west, all of a sudden lit up like you would describe seeing a big football stadium lit up at night. a huge area. way, way out at sea. and i could see the 2 flashing lights again at the bottom center of this immense  "stadium light". the mp turned his emergency lights on again and i noticed at the top of makaha ridge, just past polihale, emergency lights up there. there is a military installation up there which you can see from polihale. you should check it out on google earth there is something very mysterious going on up there. but then suddenly from the top of this huge stadium light came an object flying, towards makaha ridge. it seemed to be a long cigar shape and had several lights all in a horizontal row which seemed to twinkle. they weren't normal lights and it silently approached the island and appeared to land somewhere up on makaha ridge. immediately after all the lights out in the ocean disappeared and the mp's turned of their lights. about a half hour later 2 fighter jets took off from pmrf and disappeared over ni'ihau island. and thats my story. its 100% entirely true. i at first thought what i saw was top secret military technology. but over the years i've put some serious thought and research into this and i think it was military working with extraterrestrial entities. these events i observed on this night and other observations i have made do not frighten me in the least. i find it fascinating and would love to spend the rest of my life researching and investigation these phenomena. i'd be happy to share my other accounts with you.
thanks for doing what you do!,
    **(wit's name deleted--cms/sg_
content.summary: On the west-side of kauai i witnessed objects for several hours doing unexplainable manuervers at super sonic speeds

content.detailedDescription:
As i've done for thousands of times, i was sitting in my reclining chair on my patio looking upward at the sky admiring the stars while waiting for my dog to finish her business.  it was about 8:45pm on 3/3/2011 with a few clouds floating in the night sky.  suddenly, i noticed the strangest thing i've ever seen in my life.  a boomerang shaped craft was literally streaking from north to south across the sky directly over my head.  it seemed to be flying about the same height as a commercial airliner would fly, but was moving many, many times faster.  it transited my field of view about ten times more quickly than the commercial jets that i watch fly by everyday at this location.  it was obviously flying at many times the speed of sound, but there was no sonic boom at all.

the thing that made me really notice it was that it was semi-transparent with a green and red iridescent glow quality to the entire craft, and the incredible velocity it displayed.  this glow illuminated and outlined the entire craft.  there were no lights on the craft only the iridescent glow. each wing of the boomerang had two rows of very thin darker colored slits.  there were three slits in each row.  the shock i felt was akin to the feeling one gets when one is about to get into an accident.  it took about a half-second for my brain to realize that i was witnessing a ufo.

i immediately jumped from my chair so i could visually follow the craft as it rapidly made its way across my field of view.  the craft was streaking directly over my head at a high altitude.  it was also much larger than any commercial aircraft i've ever seen flying at altitude.  there also seemed to be a ���fuzzyish��� quality to the outline of its form. in the end, it was obscured by some clouds that were due south of me and disappeared from my sight.  the entire event lasted about 3 seconds.  

as it appeared to me, the size of the craft from wing tip to wing tip was akin to the width of my thumb held out at arms length.  the width of the boomerang wings was about one eight the wingspan.  the craft did not leave vapor trails and was dead silent.

the next day using some pine trees as reference points, the cloud height data from the prior night, and some basic trigonometry i calculated a minimum possible speed of 2000 mph.  i was super conservative with my assumptions on the numbers and believe that the craft was actually flying in excess of 5000 mph.

the experience left me feeling shaken. the entire event happened so quickly and was over so quickly it was kind of like having a bucket of ice water dumped over one's self. i do not believe that this craft originated from this planet.
content.summary: Green and red iridescencent semi-transparent boomerang shaped craft

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i was driving east on west main and saw the triangle object it was a stealth blimp it made mo sound was black and had stars on the bottom side.  i keep seeing the reports and had to write in.  i would bet on this it mad no noise floated was huge and was not special.  we have air bases in the are in ilinois and missouri so this one is not credible one of the witnesses used to live next to me and would bark at my dogs so he could call the cops and sit with a case or and stare into his porch light, please don't share this i don't want to be sued for slander sorry i would bet my life on it, blimp, sorry to burst the bubble.
content.summary: Lights over illinois shiloh, lebanon, belleville

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the stoop of my house viewing the unusual sight of new york city in blackness ( it was the night of the north east and nyc blackout of 1965.
the night was clear and i had pretty much an unobstructed view of nyc as it is in direct line of sight of my house.

everything was dark except for a moving point of light moving slowely in the sky, over manhatten from north to south.

at first i thought it to be an airplane but when it reached a position over where the trade center would later be built it came to a dead stop and remained there for just under a minute as i recall.

then it shot  straight up into the clear dark sky at an astonishing rate of speed.

i'll never forget that night. the reason i am reporting this now is because of a recent ufo video that has been on the news.
it is the one that shows a glowing object over the dome of the rock.
that video shows exactly what i witnessed in 1965 over new york city when i was 17 years old.

it behaved in exactly the same way.
content.summary: Object moved in straight line from north to south over manhatten. stopped over lower nyc then shot straight up at extreme velocity.
